text: Joinery could mean: * Woodworking joints or other types of mechanical joints (mainly in North American English) * The work of the joiner, the fabrication and installation of wooden fittings in buildings (mainly in British English). * In Australia, a joinery is also the generic term for a business which undertakes the tasks of a joiner - usually it is the name given to the premises from which such work is undertaken.
title: Joinery
